title: Journey Into The Dark Side
description: When FBI research analyst Rachel Browning discovers that her younger sister has been abducted by a nefarious slave trade group, to be auctioned off as a sex slave, she requests to go undercover with fellow FBI agent Cole Roberts as her Master Dom who will train her as his sub for this mission. Together they will present as a Master/slave couple in the hopes of getting an invitation to this private auction, under the guise of purchasing another sex slave. As Rachel trains in the world of dominance and submissive behavior, she struggles with her morals, perceptions, and losing her independence while being shocked at how her body welcomes each new experience dealt out by this handsome and intense fellow agent.
author: Mitzi D. Lane
